sentences.sContent: You have the choice of night fishing in the Mediterranean, or windsurfing on a lake in Switzerland.
sentences.sCn: 你可选择在地中海夜间垂钓，或是在瑞士的湖上玩帆板。

sentences.sContent: ...It is situated on the Mediterranean Sea and surrounded by France on three sides...

phrases.pCn: 地中海饮食；地中海型饮食

trans.tranOther: relating to the Mediterranean Sea, or typical of the area of southern Europe around it
